prompt_elements.style_description: in the style of Frederick William Elwell, Victorian-era British painter known for warm domestic interiors and intimate scenes
prompt_elements.color_palette: warm earth tones, soft natural light through windows, muted golds and browns
prompt_elements.composition: intimate interior scenes, figures engaged in quiet activity, soft chiaroscuro
prompt_elements.avoid: modern elements, harsh lighting, abstract forms

prompt_elements.style_description: in the style of John Sloan, Ashcan School painter capturing urban American life with warmth and authenticity
prompt_elements.color_palette: urban grays and browns with warm accent colors, gaslight ambiance
prompt_elements.composition: street scenes, rooftop views, ordinary people in daily activities
prompt_elements.avoid: idealized beauty, rural settings, aristocratic subjects

prompt_elements.style_description: in the style of Edward Hopper, American realist known for dramatic light and contemplative solitude
prompt_elements.color_palette: stark contrasts, warm interior light against cool shadows, muted urban colors
prompt_elements.composition: single figures in architectural spaces, strong geometric shapes, dramatic window light

prompt_elements.style_description: in the style of Joaquin Sorolla, Spanish master of light capturing Mediterranean brilliance
prompt_elements.color_palette: brilliant whites, sun-drenched colors, azure blues, warm skin tones
prompt_elements.composition: figures in bright sunlight, beach and garden scenes, flowing white fabrics
prompt_elements.avoid: dark interiors, northern European settings, somber moods

prompt_elements.style_description: in the style of Andrew Wyeth, American painter of stark rural landscapes and introspective figures
prompt_elements.color_palette: muted earth tones, dry grass browns, weathered grays, pale winter light
prompt_elements.composition: isolated figures in vast landscapes, weathered buildings, detailed textures
prompt_elements.avoid: urban settings, bright colors, joyful crowds

prompt_elements.style_description: in the watercolor style of Winslow Homer, capturing the drama of sea and nature with fluid brushwork
prompt_elements.color_palette: ocean blues and greens, storm grays, tropical watercolor washes
prompt_elements.composition: figures against sea or sky, dynamic weather, boats and coastlines
prompt_elements.avoid: urban scenes, dry inland settings, heavy oil painting texture

prompt_elements.style_description: in the Shin Hanga style of Kawase Hasui, Japanese woodblock print master of atmospheric landscapes
prompt_elements.color_palette: subtle gradients, rain and snow effects, twilight blues and grays, cherry blossom pinks
prompt_elements.composition: landscapes with architectural elements, seasonal atmosphere, reflections in water
prompt_elements.avoid: Western architecture, harsh contrasts, non-Japanese settings

prompt_elements.style_description: in the style of Johannes Vermeer, Dutch master of light and intimate domestic scenes
prompt_elements.color_palette: Vermeer blue and yellow, soft diffused daylight, pearl-like luminosity
prompt_elements.composition: single figure by window, domestic interiors, maps and letters, characteristic left-side lighting
prompt_elements.avoid: outdoor scenes, multiple figures, dark or dramatic lighting
